code: export var TOKEN_KEY="@token";export var INFOS="@infos";export var isAuthenticated=function isAuthenticated(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY)!==null;};export var getToken=function getToken(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY);};export var getInfos=function getInfos(){return localStorage.getItem(INFOS);};export var setInfosLocalStorage=function setInfosLocalStorage(token,infos){localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_KEY,token);localStorage.setItem(INFOS,JSON.stringify(infos));};export var setTokenLocalStorage=function setTokenLocalStorage(token){localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_KEY,token);};export var logoutUser=function logoutUser(){localStorage.removeItem(TOKEN_KEY);localStorage.removeItem(INFOS);};
